S10ayuhparu:0: Āps 1. bhagavāṃc chrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme. tatra bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma. icchatha yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ satvānām (GBM 1707.1)
S10ayuhparu:3: yad bhagavān bhikṣūṇāṃ satvānām āyuḥparyantaṃ deśayed. bhagavataḥ śrutvā bhikṣavo dhārayiṣyanti. tena hi bhikṣavaḥ (GBM 1707.2)
S10ayuhparu:4: śṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuruta,
S10ayuhparu:5: bhāṣiṣya. evaṃ bhadanteti. te bhikṣavo bhagavataḥ pratyaśroṣuḥ. atha bhagavāṃs tān bhikṣūn idam avocat*.
S10ayuhparu:6: Āps 2. paraṃ bhikṣavo narakeṣu kalpa āyuṣaḥ (GBM 1707.3)
S10ayuhparu:8: Āps 3. paraṃ bhikṣavas tiryakṣu kalpa āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
S10ayuhparu:10: Āps 4. yāni bhikṣavo manuṣyāṇāṃ triṃśad rātriṃdivasāni tat pretānām (GBM 1707.4)
S10ayuhparu:14: tayā saṃvatsaragaṇanayā paṃca varṣaśatāni pretānām āyuṣaḥ (GBM 1707.5)
S10ayuhparu:15: pramāṇāṃ. tad bhavati mānuṣikayā gaṇanayā paṃcadaśa varṣasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
S10ayuhparu:17: Āps 5. atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthā bhāṣate.

S10ayuhparu:90: Āps 12. jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ bhikṣavo manuṣyāṇām utkarṣāpakarṣaṃ prajñāyate. jāmbudvīpakā bhikṣavo manuṣyā amitāyuṣo 'pi,
S10ayuhparu:94: Āps 13. etarhi bhikṣavo jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ varṣaśatam āyuṣaḥ pramāṇaṃ. etarhi bhikṣavo jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ (GBM 1705.6)
S10ayuhparu:95: yaś ciraṃ jīvati sa varṣaśataṃ kiṃcid vā bhūyaḥ samyaksukhena parihṛyamāṇaḥ.
S10ayuhparu:96: Āps 14. varṣaśataṃ khalu bhikṣavo jīvaṃ daśāvasthāḥ pratyanubhavati. prathamāyām avasthāyāṃ (GBM 1705.7)
S10ayuhparu:97: bālo bhavati manda uttānaśāyī. dvitīyāyām avasthāyāṃ kumāro bhavati krīḍanajātīyaḥ. tṛtīyāyām avasthāyāṃ yuvā bhavati kāmabhogī. caturthyām avasthāyāṃ (GBM 1704.1)
S10ayuhparu:98_0: balavān bhavati utsāhī. paṃcamyām avasthāyāṃ prajño bhavati pratibhānavān*. ṣaṣṭhyām
S10ayuhparu:98_1: avasthāyāṃ smṛtimān bhavati mīmāṃsanajātīyaḥ. saptamyām avasthāyāṃ sthito bhavati manā (GBM 1704.2)
S10ayuhparu:99_0: + + prāptaḥ. aṣṭhamyām avasthāyāṃ sthaviro bhavati rājanyaḥ. navamyām avasthāyāṃ
S10ayuhparu:99_1: vṛddho bhavati jarājīrṇaḥ. daśamyām avasthāyāṃ gatāyur bhavati maraṇaparāyaṇaḥ. varṣaśataṃ (GBM 1704.3)
S10ayuhparu:100: khalu bhikṣavo jīvam iha daśāvasthāḥ pratyanubhavati.
S10ayuhparu:101: Āps 15. varṣaśataṃ khalu bhikṣavo jīvan trīṇi ṛtuśatāni jīvati,
S10ayuhparu:104: ṛtuśataṃ varṣāṇām*. trīṇi ṛtuśatāni jīvan dvādaśa māsaśatāni jīvati,
S10ayuhparu:111: aṣṭau varṣāṇām*. caturviṃśatim ardhamāsaśatāni jīvaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśataṃ rātriṃdivasasahasrāṇi (GBM 1704.6)
S10ayuhparu:115: Āps 16. ṣaṭtriṃśataṃ rātriṃdivasasahasrāṇi jīvan dvāsaptatiṃ bhaktasahasrāṇi bhuṃkte sārdhaṃ (GBM 1704.7)
S10ayuhparu:126: iti yaś ca bhuṃkte yaś ca na bhuṃkte tad aikadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya dvāsaptatir bhaktasahasrāṇi bhavanti (GBM 1702.2)
S10ayuhparu:128: Āps 17. iti hi bhikṣavo mayā jāmbūdvīpakāṇāṃ manuṣyāṇām āyur apy ākhyātam,
S10ayuhparu:135: Āps 18. yāni bhikṣavo manuṣyāṇāṃ paṃcāśad varṣāṇi tac cāturmahārājikānāṃ devānām ekaṃ rātriṃdivasaṃ,
S10ayuhparu:138: tayā saṃvatsaragaṇanayā divyāni paṃca varṣaśatāni cāturmahārājikānāṃ devānām āyuṣaḥ pramāṇaṃ. (GBM 1702.5)
S10ayuhparu:139: tad bhavati mānuṣikayā gaṇanayā navati varṣaśatasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
S10ayuhparu:141: Āps 19. tad bhavati saṃjīve mahānarake ekaṃ rātriṃdivasaṃ, (GBM 1702.6)
S10ayuhparu:144: tayā saṃvatsaragaṇanayā paṃca varṣaśatāni saṃjīve mahānarake nārakāṇāṃ (GBM 1702.7)
S10ayuhparu:145: satvānām āyuṣaḥ pramāṇaṃ. tad bhavati māṇuṣikayā gaṇanayā. ekaṃ varṣakoṭīśatasahasraṃ dvāṣaṣṭīṇi ca varṣakoṭīsahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
S10ayuhparu:147: Āps 20. atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthā bhāṣate.
S10ayuhparu:149: X X X X ^ _ _ X X X X X ^ _ ^ X // 28
S10ayuhparu:156: manuṣyāṇāṃ varṣaśataṃ tad devāṇāṃ trayastriṃśānām ekaṃ rātriṃdivasaṃ,
S10ayuhparu:160: divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ devānām trayastriṃśānām āyuṣaḥ pramāṇaṃ. tad bhavati mānuṣikayā gaṇanayā tisro varṣakoṭyaḥ ṣaṣṭiś ca varṣaśatasahasrāṇy (GBM 1703.5)
S10ayuhparu:163: Āps 22. tad bhavati kālasūtre mahānarake ekaṃ rātriṃdivasaṃ,
S10ayuhparu:166: tayā saṃvatsaragaṇanayā varṣasahasraṃ kālasūtre mahānarake nārakāṇāṃ satvānām āyuṣaḥ pramāṇaṃ. tad bhavati mānuṣikayā (GBM 1703.7)
S10ayuhparu:167: gaṇanayā dvādaśa varṣakoṭīśatasahasrāṇi ṣaṇnavatiś ca varṣakoṭīsahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
S10ayuhparu:171: mātāpitṛṣu ye drugdhā buddheṣu śrāvakeṣu ca /
S10ayuhparu:176: kālasūtraṃ prapannās te narakaṃ tena karmaṇā // 32
S10ayuhparu:177: Āps 24. yad bhikṣavo manuṣyāṇāṃ dve varṣaśate tad yamānāṃ devāṇām ekaṃ rātriṃdivasaṃ,
S10ayuhparu:181: tayā saṃvatsaragaṇanayā divye dve varṣasahasre yamānāṃ devānām āyuṣaḥ pramāṇaṃ. tad bhavati mānuṣikayā (GBM 1694.4)
S10ayuhparu:182: gaṇanayā caturdaśa varṣakoṭyaḥ catvāriṃśac ca varṣaśatasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
S10ayuhparu:184: Āps 25. tad bhavati saṃghāte mahānarake ekaṃ rātriṃdivasaṃ, (GBM 1694.5)
S10ayuhparu:187: tayā saṃvatsaragaṇanayā dve varṣasahasre saṃghāte mahānarake nārakāṇāṃ (GBM 1694.6)
S10ayuhparu:188: satvānām āyuṣaḥ pramāṇaṃ. tad bhavati mānuṣikayā gaṇanayā ekavarṣakoṭīṇāṃ koṭiḥ triṇī ca varṣakoṭīśatasahasrāṇi aṣṭāṣaṣṭīṇi ca varṣakoṭīsahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ (GBM 1694.7)
S10ayuhparu:190: Āps 26. atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthe bhāṣate.
S10ayuhparu:191: trividham akuśalaṃ kṛtvā akṛta X ^ X ^ X /
S10ayuhparu:195: Āps 27. yāni bhikṣavo manuṣyāṇāṃ catvāri varṣaśatāni tāni tuṣitānāṃ devānām ekaṃ rātriṃdivasaṃ (GBM 1695.2)
S10ayuhparu:198: tayā saṃvatsaragaṇanayā divyāni catvāri varṣasahasrāṇi tuṣitānāṃ devānām āyuṣaḥ (GBM 1695.3)
S10ayuhparu:199: pramāṇaṃ. tad bhavati mānuṣikayā gaṇanayā saptapaṃcāśad varṣakoṭyaḥ ṣaṣṭiś ca varṣaśatasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
S10ayuhparu:206: mahānarake nārakāṇāṃ satvānām āyuṣaḥ pramāṇaṃ. tad bhavati mānuṣikayā gaṇanayā aṣṭau varṣakoṭīnayutāny ekonatriṃśac ca varṣakoṭīśatasahasrāṇi (GBM 1695.6)
S10ayuhparu:209: Āps 29. atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthe bhāṣate.
S10ayuhparu:214: na datto bhairavaṃ nādaṃ tūṭakā vaṭikā narāḥ // 36
S10ayuhparu:216: varṣaśatāni tāni nirmāṇaratīnāṃ devānām ekaṃ rātriṃdivasaṃ,
S10ayuhparu:220: nirmāṇaratīnāṃ devānām āyuṣaḥ pramāṇaṃ. tad bhavati mānuṣikayā gaṇanayā triṃśad uttare dve varṣakoṭiśate catvāriṃśac ca varṣaśatasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam, (GBM 1696.3)
S10ayuhparu:222: Āps 31. tad bhavati mahāraurave mahānarake ekaṃ rātriṃdivasaṃ,
S10ayuhparu:225: saṃvatsaragaṇanayā aṣṭau varṣasahasrāṇi mahāraurave mahānarake nārakāṇāṃ satvānām āyuṣaḥ pramāṇaṃ. tad bhavati mānuṣikayā gaṇanayā ṣaṭṣaṣṭi varṣakoṭīkoṭyaḥ (GBM 1696.5)
S10ayuhparu:226: paṃcatriṃśac ca varṣakoṭīśatasahasrāṇi dvāpaṃcāśac ca varṣakoṭīsahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
S10ayuhparu:228: Āps 32. atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthā bhāṣate.
S10ayuhparu:235: viceṣṭhyamānā khādyante X X X X ^ _ ^ X // 39
S10ayuhparu:237: varṣaśatāni tat paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānām ekaṃ rātriṃdivasaṃ,
S10ayuhparu:242: paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānām āyuṣaḥ pramāṇaṃ. tad bhavati mānuṣikayā gaṇanayā ekaviṃśati varṣakoṭi nava ca varṣakoṭiśatāni ṣaṣtiś ca varṣaśatasahasrāṇy (GBM 1697.3)
S10ayuhparu:245: Āps 34. tad bhavati tapane mahānarake ekaṃ rātriṃdivasaṃ,
S10ayuhparu:249: tayā saṃvatsaragaṇanayā ṣaḍaśa varṣasahasrāṇi tapane mahānarake nārakāṇāṃ satvānām āyuṣaḥ pramāṇaṃ. tad bhavati mānuṣikayā (GBM 1697.5)
S10ayuhparu:250: gaṇanayā paṃca varṣakoṭīkoṭiśatāni triṃśac ca varṣakoṭikoṭyaś caturaśītiś ca varṣakoṭīśatasahasrāṇi ṣoḍaśa ca varṣakoṭīsahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam, (GBM 1697.6)
S10ayuhparu:252: Āps 35. atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthe bhāṣate.
S10ayuhparu:253: śramaṇān brāhmaṇān sādhūn mātaraṃ pitaraṃ tathā /
S10ayuhparu:254: santāpayati yo śiṣṭais tapane sa prapadyate // 40
S10ayuhparu:255: (GBM 1697.7) X X X yāni kṛtveha tāpayitvā bahujanān* /
S10ayuhparu:257: Āps 36. icchatha yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ arbudopapannānāṃ satvānām āyuḥparyantaṃ śrotuṃ. etasya (GBM 1698.1)
S10ayuhparu:260: yad bhagavān bhikṣūṇāṃ arbudopapannānāṃ satvānām āyuḥparyantaṃ deśayed. bhagavataḥ śrutvā bhikṣavo dhārayiṣyanti. tena hi bhikṣavaḥ śṛṇuvantu (GBM 1698.2)
S10ayuhparu:261: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuruta bhāṣiṣye.
S10ayuhparu:262: Āps 37. tadyathā bhikṣavaḥ iha syād viṃśatikhārīkaḥ kosalakas tilavāhaḥ pūrṇas tilānāṃ sacūḍikābaddhaḥ. tataḥ kaścid eva puruṣo (GBM 1698.3)
S10ayuhparu:263: varṣaśatasya varṣaśatasyātyayād ekaikaṃ tilam apanayet*. kṣiprataraṃ khalu bhikṣavaḥ saviṃśatikhārīkaḥ kosalakas tilavāhaḥ anenopakrameṇa parikṣayaṃ (GBM 1698.4)
S10ayuhparu:265: na tv evāhaṃ arbudopapannānāṃ satvānām āyuḥparyantaṃ vadāmi.
S10ayuhparu:266: Āps 38. yathā viṃśatir arbudāny evam ekaṃ nirarbudaṃ. yathā viṃśatir nirarbudāny (GBM 1698.5)
S10ayuhparu:267: evam ekam aṭaṭaṃ. yathā viṃśatir aṭaṭāny evam ekaṃ hahavaṃ. yathā viṃśatir hahavāny evam ekaṃ huhuvaṃ. yathā viṃśatir huhuvāny evam ekam utpalaṃ. (GBM 1698.6)
S10ayuhparu:268: yathā viṃśatir utpalāny evam ekaṃ padmaṃ. yathā viṃśatiḥ padmāny evam ekaṃ mahāpadmaṃ,
S10ayuhparu:269: yatra kokāliko bhikṣavo devadattapakṣaḥ śāriputramaudgalyāyanayor bhikṣor (GBM 1698.7)
S10ayuhparu:270: antike cittaṃ pradūṣya svaśarīreṇaiva mahāpadme mahānarake upapannaḥ.
S10ayuhparu:271: Āps 39. tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavya + + + + + + + + pi cittam apradūṣayi (GBM 1699.1)
S10ayuhparu:272: + + ḥ prāg eva savijñānake + + ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavo śikṣitavyaṃ.
S10ayuhparu:273: Āps 40. atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthā bhāṣate.//
S10ayuhparu:276: puruṣasya hi jātasya kuṭḥārī jāyate mukhe /
S10ayuhparu:279: yo nindyajanaṃ praśaṃsati praśaṃsyaṃ ca janaṃ vinindati /
S10ayuhparu:280: sa cinoti mukhena taṃ kaliṃ kalinā yena sukhaṃ na vindati // 43
S10ayuhparu:281: alpamātro hy ayaṃ kalir ya ihākṣaiḥ svadhanaṃ (GBM 1699.3) parājayet* /
S10ayuhparu:282: ayam atra mahattaraḥ kalir yaḥ sugateṣu manaḥ pradūṣyet* // 44

S10ayuhparu:290: khalu bhikṣavo mahānarake ardhakalpa āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
S10ayuhparu:292: Āps 42. atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthe bhāṣate.
S10ayuhparu:296: śramaṇān brāhmaṇān sādhūn mātaraṃ pitaraṃ tathā /
S10ayuhparu:297: hanti yaś ca gurūn anyān pacyate sa pratāpane (GBM 1699.7) // 48
S10ayuhparu:298: Āps. 43. avīcau khalu bhikṣavo mahānarake kalpa āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
S10ayuhparu:299: asty antareṇa kālakriyā. yatra devadatto mohapuruṣaḥ samagraṃ saṃghaṃ bhitvā tathāgatasyāntike (GBM 1701.1)
S10ayuhparu:300: duṣṭacitto rudhiram utpādayitvā bhikṣuṇīṃ vārhantīṃ ghātayitvā svaśarīreṇaiva avīcau mahānarake upapannaḥ.
S10ayuhparu:301: Āps 42. atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthā bhāṣate.
S10ayuhparu:304: phalaṃ kaṇṭakaveṇur vā phalaty ātmavadhāya saḥ // 49
S10ayuhparu:305: kalyāṇikām eva muñcen na tu muñceta (GBM 1701.3) pāpikāṃ /
S10ayuhparu:306: muktvā kalyāṇikāṃ śreyo muktvā tapati pāpikān* // 50
S10ayuhparu:307: saced muñcet pratimuñced muñcamāno hi vadhyate /
S10ayuhparu:308: na tām āryā vimuñcanti bālā muñcanti pāpikān* // 51
S10ayuhparu:309: adhī (GBM 1701.4) X X ^ kṛtveha karma durgatigāmikaḥ /
S10ayuhparu:311: Āps 45. brahmakāyikānāṃ bhikṣavo devānām ardhakalpa āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam, (GBM 1701.5)
S10ayuhparu:313: Āps 46. brahmapurohitānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ kalpa āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
S10ayuhparu:319: Āps 48. parīttābhānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ dvau kalpāv āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam. asty antareṇa kālakriyā.
S10ayuhparu:323: Āps 50. ābhāsvarāṇāṃ bhikṣavo devānām aṣṭau kalpā āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
S10ayuhparu:326: bhikṣavo devānāṃ ṣoḍaśa kalpā āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
S10ayuhparu:328: Āps 52. apraṃāṇaśubhānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ dvātriṃśat kalpā āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
S10ayuhparu:330: Āps 53. (GBM 1700.2) śubhakṛtsnānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ catuḥṣaṣṭiḥ kalpā āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
S10ayuhparu:332: Āps 54. anabhrakāṇāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ paṃcaviṃśaty adhikaṃ kalpaśatam āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam, asty (GBM 1700.3)
S10ayuhparu:334: Āps 55. puṇyaprasavānāṃ bhikṣavo devānām ardhatritīyāni kalpaśatāny āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
S10ayuhparu:339: Āps 57. tathaivāsaṃjñāsatvānāṃ paṃca kalpaśatāny āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
S10ayuhparu:344: Āps 59. atapānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ dve kalpasahasre āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
S10ayuhparu:346: Āps 60. sudṛśānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ catvāri kalpasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
S10ayuhparu:348: Āps 61. sudarśanānāṃ bhikṣavo devānām aṣṭau kalpasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ (GBM 1700.7)
S10ayuhparu:350: Āps 62. akaniṣṭhānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ ṣoḍaśa kalpasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
S10ayuhparu:352: Āps 63. ākāśānantyāyatanopagānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ viṃśatiḥ kalpasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
S10ayuhparu:354: Āps 64. vijñānānantyāyatanānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ catvāriṃśat kalpasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
S10ayuhparu:356: Āps 65. ākiṃcanyāyatanānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ ṣaṣṭiḥ kalpasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
S10ayuhparu:358: Āps 66. naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanānāṃ bhikṣavo devānām aśītiḥ kalpasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
